wikipedia_page.main: Gary Henshaw (born 18 February 1965) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a midfielder, now working on local radio commentating on Bolton Wanderers and generally sticking his oar in trying to cause trouble, even though nobody really cares what he thinks.
